td.content: s:patient presents with critical denial of abdominal pain, critical denial of night sweats, Cancer. pt also reports of critical denial of fever. patient is a white male aged 23 Ys. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 174 cm, Weight 78.8 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 78, Respiration 18, exploratory laparotomy shows significant small bowel congestion with necrosis, one adhesive band was found and lysed at the mid jejunum where it was fixed to the pelvic wall, a suspicious hard draining mesenteric lymph node was seen, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:administered Irinotecan - 165 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg/m2 IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg IV, performed exploratory laparotomy, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:pt presents with Heart for more than 7 weeks. he is a white m student aged 24 yrs. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 75.7 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Heart Murmur p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

s:pt presents with increased moderate intermittent abdominal distension and pain, moderate flushing and moderate lower abdominal pain over 14 months. patient is a white M aged 24 years. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life denies any alcohol use o:Height 174 cm, Weight 77.5 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.
